name: Papa's Pizzeria to Go!
storyline: Things get messy when you’re stuck running a wildly popular pizza parlor in Papa’s Pizzeria To Go! Top, bake, and serve pizzas in this award-winning game that’s reimagined for mobile phones. Use the brand-new Lobby tool to add items to your restaurant, and move and arrange them however you like!
summary: Top, bake, and serve pizzas in Papa's Pizzeria To Go!
